buginformation.summary: Update instructions for running shell tests using maven.
buginformation.description: In http://hbase.apache.org/book/hbase.tests.html, it is mentioned that using mvn clean test -Dtest=TestShell -Dshell.test=AdminAlterTableTestwill help us in running specific shell tests. But it doesn't work unless we use package as target and ruby literal equivalent. So, it should have beenmvn clean package -Dtest=TestShell -Dshell.test=/AdminAlterTableTest/Thanks, busbey for helping me in digging this out.
